guide.introduction: This is a simple plan graphically showing one of the best way to save energy in a house.

lines.text: Insulating your attic door could save you from burning away a couple hundred dollars a year.
lines.text_raw: Insulating your attic door could save you from burning away a couple hundred dollars a year.

lines.text: There are other ways of insulating an attic door but this one works well, is hard to mess up and fairly in expensive.
lines.text_raw: There are other ways of insulating an attic door but this one works well, is hard to mess up and fairly in expensive.

lines.text: I use Great Stuff (tm) to glue sheets of foam together and to the finished surface. Use a clamp or masking tape or some other method to maintain pressure and contain movement while setting.
